'''''You Can't Help Your Feelings''''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Wonders of the World]]''. To complete this achievement, the player needs to complete ''[[Hiromi's Watch]].''

==Trivia==
* The Chinese name is an idiom that typically refers to one being compelled by their circumstances or feelings to do something. This idiom is also used as a pun in romance to refer to someone who can't help but fall in love.
** The name may also be a reference to the well-known Chinese song {{lang|''Can't Help Falling in Love with You''|zh=情非得已}} by {{w|Harlem Yu}}.
